[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards](./opensearch-dashboards.md) &gt; [ICspConfig](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.md) &gt; [strict](./opensearch-dashboards.icspconfig.strict.md)

## ICspConfig.strict property

Specify whether browsers that do not support CSP should be able to use OpenSearch Dashboards. Use `true` to block and `false` to allow.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly strict: boolean;
```
